text: @LindseyGrahamSC Actually, @realDonaldTrump did exactly as the Chinese did. He covered up and ignored all the warnings and did nothing to prepare. This is 100% why the USA is leading the world in COVID-19 cases and deaths. The rest of the world took action after being duped by China, USA did not.
